document.full_text: new york city mayor michael bloomberg is suffering so-called "third term-itis," with only 40 percent of voters approving of his job as good or excellent, a poll found on thursday, down nearly 30 percent from 2008.
document.title: ny's bloomberg hit with "third term-itis": poll
lines_and_colors: new york city mayor michael bloomberg is suffering so-called "third term-itis," with only 40 percent of voters approving of his job as good or excellent, a poll found on thursday, down nearly 30 percent from 2008.
